item.name: Crown of the Icy Blue Rose

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crown of the Icy Blue Rose

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 840,971 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 330,024.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Sleeveless T-Shirt
description: On the inside collar it reads, 'Inspected by Earl Z. Moade.'

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 840,971 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 330,024.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Use: Gain 4,660 Parry and 3,314 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 84,349 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 840,971 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 330,024.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Carve a wax copy of your target, which absorbs 50% of their damage taken. The absorption heats up the wax, causing it to melt after absorbing 3.3 million damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Command the Medichopper to attach to your target, absorbing 197,823 damage and granting them 1,338 versatility for 15 sec.

While attached, your healing spells have a chance to refuel the chopper, granting these bonuses to their host again. (2 Min Cooldown)
